#include<stdio.h>
#include<cmath>
int main(){

	int n , k , prev, last, level;
	scanf("%d%d",&n,&k);
	int i = 1;
	scanf("%d",&prev);
	while( i < n ){
		scanf("%d",&last);
		if( std::abs( last - prev ) <= k )
			i++;
		else break;
		prev = last;
	}
	level = i;
	i++;
	while( i++ < n )
		scanf("%d",&last);
	printf("%d\n", level);
	return 0;
}
